name: The Frog In The Burning Fire
name_original: The Frog In The Burning Fire
description:
The Frog In The Burning Fire is a looping puzzle platformer that has you take the role of a frog vigilante scouring ruins lost in the desert to save his frog companions. Aided by a shape-shifting sprite, make sure you release all the captive frogs before time runs out, or else...

This game was made with Pixel Game Maker MV, Aseprite, and Beepbox for the Ludum Dare Frogs² Mini Game Jam 2022.

Controls

Use either your game controller or the keyboard. 

For Keyboard

← → to move left or right

D to jump

A to slash

F5 to reset the game

Esc to toggle full screen

How to Play

The goal is to rescue all three frogs in each stage before the timer expires or you lose all health points. The game currently only consists of one main puzzle level in which you need to find the correct door-key combination by matching the colour of your pet sprite with the door of the same colour. Hit the coloured orbs to force your sprite to shape-shift and lead it towards a matching-colour door to open it.
